title: Flux 'develop' fails to build
body:
The latest version of Flux fails to build and install under Spack.  It fails to build the documentation.  Relevant log:

```
a2x: ERROR: "xsltproc"  --stringparam callout.graphics 0 --stringparam navig.graphics 0 --stringparam admon.textlabel 1 --stringparam admon.graphics 0  "/data/hd1/Repositories/spack/opt/spack/linux-Ubuntu16-x86_64/gcc-5.4.0/asciidoc-8.6.9-ih72kxayqymv73wtagfje4fo5ajt3gvq/etc/asciidoc/docbook-xsl/manpage.xsl" "/tmp/sherbein/spack-stage/spack-stage-5gaNjd/flux-core/doc/man1/flux-keygen.xml" returned non-zero exit status 5
a2x: ERROR: "xsltproc"  --stringparam callout.graphics 0 --stringparam navig.graphics 0 --stringparam admon.textlabel 1 --stringparam admon.graphics 0  "/data/hd1/Repositories/spack/opt/spack/linux-Ubuntu16-x86_64/gcc-5.4.0/asciidoc-8.6.9-ih72kxayqymv73wtagfje4fo5ajt3gvq/etc/asciidoc/docbook-xsl/manpage.xsl" "/tmp/sherbein/spack-stage/spack-stage-5gaNjd/flux-core/doc/man1/flux-snoop.xml" returned non-zero exit status 5
Makefile:672: recipe for target 'flux-keygen.1' failed
make[2]: *** [flux-keygen.1] Error 1
make[2]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
```

When I run the same command with `spack env flux`, it successfully completes, so I am unsure of how to debug this issue:

```
→ ./spack env flux "xsltproc"  --stringparam callout.graphics 0 --stringparam navig.graphics 0 --stringparam admon.textlabel 1 --stringparam admon.graphics 0  "/data/hd1/Repositories/spack/opt/spack/linux-Ubuntu16-x86_64/gcc-5.4.0/asciidoc-8.6.9-ih72kxayqymv73wtagfje4fo5ajt3gvq/etc/asciidoc/docbook-xsl/manpage.xsl" "/tmp/sherbein/spack-stage/spack-stage-5gaNjd/flux-core/doc/man1/flux-keygen.xml"
Note: Writing flux-keygen.1
```

@trws, any suggestions?

EDIT: I forgot to mention that I am running into this issue with the version of Spack found in PR #2108.

Full build log: **https://gist.github.com/SteVwonder/22124fffade9ada75855809049c1ac28**
